Talon::

Talon smiled and she leaned back.  Windlord kept the speed following his 
friends

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Friday, February 11, 2011 9:53 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!

Tucson gently chuckles.  He fully agreed with Talon.

"Can't - Argue with you on that.  At least becomming - A Prime has made me 
learn how to curb my impulsiveness and my - temper somewhat.  Yet, I suppose 
part of the old me is still not going to give up fighting for what he 
believes in.  And that's Freedom for all who deserve it.  And - justice for 
those, who have taken it away.  That is all I want, and hope for."

He sighs while pausing.

" Eventually I - would like to see this planet become peaceful.  A world 
where no one has to worry about dictatorship or slavory. And most of all, 
not have to worry about ever being wrongfully tormented by neither Predacon, 
or Decepticon.  I - trust Char is still an existing terrestrial planet...  I 
will have to - research that in depth..  It - would be a fitting place for 
the Predacons and Decepticons.  And if I - have to assert myself to get them 
to submit to my demands, I - will."

Straight Shot looks to Tucson's vitals while in the cab with Talon.

"Hey, careful, don't excite yourself so much.  Your energy levels are 
dropping really fast, try ta save yourself so you don't go off line okay?"

Tucson replies.

"Of course.  You're - right Straight Shot."

Straight Shot looks to Talon.

" I so admire you for putting up with his stubborn behavior."

Tucson grumbles.

"Heeyyy.."

Straight Shot eyes him.

" Ah, ah, ahh, I'm right and you know it.  So don't go grumbling at me.  And 
for Primus' sake, listen ta Talon will ya?!"

He replies.

"Well do."

Rat Trap now finds the perfect opportunity to drop in on Tucson's cab, and 
then finds his way inside on the driver's side, as he sits on the dash 
board.

"Whoops, sorry, hope I didn't obstruct your view.  Hey, how's it gon' 
Wheels?  Geeze, you're losn' energy really fast, where's the energy leak 
commn' from?"

Straight Shot looks to him.

"His arm, Hydras bit him and now he's leaking battery fluid rapidly. But now 
he's transformed so it's hard ta tell where it's coming from."

Rat Trap widens his eyes.

"Ohh scrap, a battery fluid leak is bad news.  Hey, maybe I can find it and 
kinda slow it down enough ta get the big guy back ta base. Hang on Wheels, I 
saved ya once, I can do it again."

He scrambles out and looks for the leak.  He finds it at the head of 
Tucson's right driver's side front wheel axle.

"Got it, Ohh it's a biggie.  I see a few severed lines down here, but I know 
I can patch these up temporarilly ta stop the leaks, until he gets back ta 
the Ark for repairs."

Night Shift drives up to him, and with a special grappler hook, he hands him 
a special metallic tape.

"Need this?"

Rat Trap nodds.

"Yep, that's the stuff, thanks Night Shift.  Okaay, I'm not really good at 
this but it'll hold 'em over."

Rat Trap now tapes up the wound, to slow the bleeding.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Talon/windlord::
>
> "We live to fight another day"said Talon while she squezed glenty a part 
> of
> her seat"Relax... we have to leave this place before it blew up"
>
>
> Windlor speeded up following his fellows
>
> -----Original Message----- 
> From: Sandy
> Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2011 9:24 AM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!
>
> Rat Trap could see Tucson below, as he's being towed by his comrades. He
> looks up to Windlord pleadingly, wanting to be set down on Tucson's 
> trailer
> if possible.
>
> " Could ya set me down on Wheel's trailer?  I gotta see how he's don'. 
> Poor
> bot, he really took a gamble out there for us."
>
> Down on the ground, Tucson sighs.  His condition was not the best, yet he
> tries hard to fend off the worst of its affects.
>
> " I've been through - worse Talon.  I'm all right.  My - only regret, is
> that - I - did not think things through as I - should have.  I - 
> completely
> ignorred Master - Yokitron's training, which - would have been - more
> effective in - this case, rather - than brute force.  All - of you went -
> above and - beyond the - call of duty, and I - can - never repay you - for
> your outstanding dedication to our - cause.  I - have to learn - not to 
> let
> my - temper get - the better - of me.  Today - is such an example."
>
> As they head home, Tucson gradually reveals more and more of himself to 
> his
> comrades, which was definitely an infinite show of trust.
>
> " Before the power - of the Matrix, I - was known to be - a bit more
> aggressive than - most Autobots.  Talon, you know- you - saw that first 
> hand
> when - we encountered that Minion in that abandoned base.  I - locked 
> myself
> in with the enemy, and did - not stop until I had him restrained.  That -
> too was one of my mistakes, I - was lucky it turned out for the best."
>
> He sighs once more.  Battery fluid continues to leak from his injury.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@> wrote:

> > Talon/Windlord/Kup

> > "I'm ok... How about you?"

> > -----Original Message----- 
> > From: Sandy
> > Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2011 10:32 AM
> > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!
> >
> > Outside the Ark:
> >
> > Uproar paces back and forth, as part of his own thinking process.  He
> > tended
> > to do that when he was in deep thought, which wasn't too often for him.
> > Quickstride watches.
> >
> > It was almost as if the curious cat was trying to bring out his
> > resourceful
> > side, which to him was a bit difficult.  He then looks to fallen rocks 
> > on
> > the ground, of different sizes.  Quickstride gives him and Rodimus and 
> > the
> > others a perplexed look.
> >
> > " Well, that's really nice of you guys to be concerned..  Hmm, umm, I
> > dunno
> > what Uproar's up to.  Not like him ta be fixated on tiny objects like
> > that..."
> >
> > Uproar looks up to everyone.
> >
> > "Oh, sorry, I didn't mean to go into wierd mode.  I'm lookn' at these
> > rocks
> > because, some of these may be comrpised of different minerals and 
> > alloys.
> > Maybe one of them has an alloy that's resistant to the force shield.. 
> > And
> > what if one of these was batted into the field...  And maybe, if there 
> > is
> > an
> > outside pannel that controls it, could that rock be swatted at the
> > controls,
> > and disable the field long enough ta get us all through without a 
> > hitch?"
> >
> > Quickstride looks to Leo#2, and the others.
> >
> > " Heeey, guys, he's onta something.  Rodimus, do you know if the Ark's 
> > got
> > an external control pannel for the force shield?  If so, we might just
> > have
> > this problem solved."
> >
> > Uproar demonstrates his knack for swatting at rocks, as he swatts one in
> > an
> > opposite direction a good distance away from the group.
> >
> > "See?  What'dya think?"
> >
> > Inside the Black Fortress, Rat Trap heaves a temporarry sigh of relief,
> > knowing that it's clear sailing for Windlord and himself.
> >
> > "Whew, we're off the hook for now, but we'd be better off if we could 
> > get
> > a
> > little further away from here. I can't wait ta get home, where it's 
> > safe,
> > and we don't have ta worry about gettn' our tails toasted."
> >
> > Outside the Ark, Night Shift didn't care how long it would take the
> > Furzors
> > to help Tucson, he was just very happy to get the assistance.  He looks 
> > to
> > Torca with a smile of appreciation.
> >
> > "Heey, whatever you can do for us, works, speed or no speed.  Okay Kup,
> > that's it, but don't strain your engine, okay?  Time for me ta start
> > pulln'
> > my own weight too."
> >
> > He gets into his vehicle mode, and zooms up to Kup as he works beside 
> > him.
> >
> > "Don't worry Tucson, we got you."
> >
> > Tucson clings to consciousness as best he can.
> >
> > "Thank you.  I appreciate everyone's help.  But - please, do - not 
> > strain
> > your systems on my - account."
> >
> > Sensing Talon inside, Tucson tries to regulate the climate inside his 
> > cab,
> > to help make her feel more comfortable.  Even that was quite a chore, as
> > he
> > tries to deliver a good amount of Air filtration and conditioning to 
> > cool
> > the atmosphere, yet deliver enough oxygen to clean it as well.
> >
> > " Talon, are - you all right?"
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Elita/Perceptor /Kup/Nightlight/Windlord/Talon/Hydras
> > >
> > > Elita poped up behind Lord Elder and sayd in low voice "I'm here... 
> > > i'm
> > > hunting Predacons... Do you want to join me?"
> > >
> > > *******************************
> > > Perceptor sit down and started to meditate while the breath of
> > > Nightlight
> > > became slow and rythm. Perceptor just got lost in his own mind and
> > > tought
> > > a lot of things about his past and posible future.
> > >
> > > Beep... beep... beep
> > >
> > > The machine continue cheking the Nightlight's vitals signals with no
> > > change.
> > >
> > > *********************************
> > > In the Battle field Windlord speed up himself in order to leave the
> > > explosion area and time was running out. Hydras said with an cold 
> > > voice
> > > "We dont have time to... have some fun; we must survive to fight 
> > > another
> > > day"
> > >
> > > Kup conceus that they didnt have time to loose he speed up, pulling
> > > Tucson
> > > outside the explosion area. Talon hold back a moan and she squeezed
> > > tightly a part of her seat.
> > >
> > > BlackFortress self destruction program said in loud voice "Count down 
> > > to
> > > destruction 1 min 50 seconds"
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Super Cyclonus
> > > Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2011 1:36 PM
> > > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> > > Subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > OUTSIDE THE ARK
> > >
> > > Rodimus and Leo II sat there listening as Uproar and Quickstride 
> > > relate
> > > their idea about attempting to disrupt the forcefield with their 
> > > bodies
> > > while the rest of the group got through.
> > >
> > > Leo II, just shook his head as a small smile sketched itself on his, 
> > > "No
> > > lads." He said, his voice serious, despite the smile, "There is no
> > > reason
> > > for you to sacrifice yourselves like that."
> > >
> > > Wing Caliber, one of the Maximal tactical specialists, nodded, 
> > > "Besides,
> > > if it were that easy to get in, don't you think Megatron would have
> > > sacrificed a few of his troops to get through years ago before this
> > > Hydras
> > > showed up?"
> > >
> > > Rodimus smiled at Leo II and Wing Caliber thankful for their input,
> > > "They
> > > are right. No we need you two here with us."
> > >
> > > Rodimus paused as he got a call . . .
> > >
> > > > Perceptor opened his comlink to Rodimus and said "Less than 2 
> > > > mins...
> > > > Nightlight is free; we will sedate her, I have an idea to see if
> > > > reprogramation actually worked, but i need you here"
> > >
> > > "I read you." He said as he looked back at the others, holding up his
> > > hand, it would soon be time. Rodimus glanced at the Ark, "Just a 
> > > little
> > > bit more." He said as he held out his signature scrambling device, 
> > > ready
> > > to use it.
> > >
> > > Leo II, Wing Caliber and Ramulus tensed up, ready to dash when Rodimus
> > > gave the signal.
> > >
> > >
> > > INSIDE THE ARK
> > >
> > > As Perceptor communicated with Rodimus on the outside, Legacy, Bump 
> > > and
> > > Santon continued to oversee the reboot of Nightlight, Bump and Santon
> > > giving a visible sight of relief as her systems were beginning to come
> > > up.
> > >
> > > Legacy carefully positioned a device over Nightlight's chest and
> > > delivered
> > > a sedative, one that would keep her systems stable but would also keep
> > > her
> > > unconscious.
> > >
> > > Santon glanced over at Perceptor and then back at Nightlight, shaking
> > > his
> > > head, obviously uncomfortable about the whole thing, saving Nightlight
> > > by
> > > working with the very being who had subjected her to this in the first
> > > place. However for the moment he was content to let things lie.
> > >
> > > Meanwhile, elsewhere in the Ark,
> > >
> > > "Elita! Elita!" Lord Elder's voice could be heard near by. Even though
> > > he
> > > was whispering as loud as he could, his voice sounded weak as the 
> > > sounds
> > > of a shuffled movement could be heard in the darkness of Elita's room.
> > >
> > > "Elita . . . " Elder's voice sounded as if it were getting further 
> > > away.
> > >
> > > OUTSIDE THE TOWER
> > >
> > > > Hydras started to move away, trying reach a safe distance; while he
> > > > was
> > > > doing that he open com link with all Predacons and said "TO ALL
> > > > PREDACONS LEAVE THE BLACKFORTRESS and sorrounding area,
> > > > NOW... FOLLOW MY SIGNAL!!!!!"
> > >
> > > As Hydras gives the order the other Predacons transform into to Beast
> > > Mode
> > > to make their get away, the vast majority of them taking to the air! 
> > > The
> > > large door on the black Tower opens as Scourge and Cyclonus fly out,
> > > both
> > > of them already in their aerial modes, boosters flaring as they hit 
> > > the
> > > skies!
> > >
> > > However as they fly they can almost immediately make out the form of
> > > Windlord as he carried Rat Trap in his claws, the duo began to change
> > > their vector of flight, angling towards them.
> > >
> > > "Sir." Cyclonus transmited over his radio to Hydras, "The Maximals 
> > > that
> > > attempted to break into the Fortress are trying to make their get away
> > > as
> > > well. Shall we terminate them?"
> > >
> > > They began to fly after Windlord, their superior speed in the air 
> > > making
> > > it easy for them to begin to close the distance between them, rocket 
> > > and
> > > missile launchers beginning to glow as they targeted the flying
> > > Maximals.
> > >
> > > Meanwhile on the ground,
> > >
> > > Torca nodded as Hydras and the other Predacons began to back off. "We
> > > Fuzors don't have wheels and drive." He said to Nightshift as looked
> > > around and then glanced back at Tuscon in vehicular mode. "But let's 
> > > see
> > > what we can do."
> > >
> > > "BANTOR!" Torca called out, "Beast Mode!"
> > >
> > > The Maximal in question quickly transformed into the somewhat bizzar
> > > alternate mode, becoming a cross between a baboon and a Tiger; looking
> > > strong and powerful, even if unconventional.
> > >
> > > With that Torca transformed into his beastmode as well, that of an
> > > elephant and a Killer whale. He along with Bantor positioned 
> > > themselves
> > > to
> > > the front of Tuscon. "We won't be the fastest things, but we can get 
> > > you
> > > home." Torca said as he waited to pull.
> > >
> > > Above their heads Noctorro, Air Hammer and Silverbolt take to the 
> > > skies,
> > > becoming an aerial escort to the injured Maximals and Autobots!
> > >
